DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to investigate the superiority of nateglinide over placebo for inadequately controlled type 2 diabetic patients with pioglitazone treatment.
DOC.brief_title: Nateglinide: a Double Blind Add-on Study With Pioglitazone for Type 2 Diabetic Patients
DOC.criteria: Type 2 diabetes mellitus under the treatment with pioglitazone Patients who cannot follow the diet therapy and/or exercise therapy Type 1 diabetes mellitus
